title: How can I contact the admission department? I live very far from Bangalore and cannot go to Bangalore just to submit a letter.

comments.body:
You can use the below email IDs -

[admissions@pesimsr.pes.edu](mailto:admissions@pesimsr.pes.edu)   
[admissions@pes.edu](mailto:admissions@pes.edu)   
[admission@pes.edu](mailto:admission@pes.edu)   
[kaverammakt@pes.edu](mailto:kaverammakt@pes.edu)   
[admission.ec@pes.edu](mailto:admission.ec@pes.edu)   
[admission.rr@pes.edu](mailto:admission.rr@pes.edu) [pesit\_gems\_feedback@pes.edu](mailto:pesit_gems_feedback@pes.edu)

*Note: I am not sure which one is the correct one, but you can try calling the admission office from* [*www.pes.edu*](http://www.pes.edu) *website*  
*for more information*
